item.title: Mod Fibonacci
item.description: Using modulo to create a looping pattern from number sequences such as the Fibonacci numbers can create a cool structure. FibmodFibmod I learned about this idea here: The shape is made by drawing a line and then turning 90 degrees either left or right depending on whether the result of a modulo fib number is odd or even. FibmodFibmod The code can be found here:
